#Text=Ramat Gan
#Text=Ramat Gan ( Hebrew : רמת גן ) ( Translation : Garden heights ) is a city in Israel , to the immediate east of Tel Aviv , which almost acts as an extension of it .

#Text=Ramat Gan is an eclectic town famous for many things totally unrelated to each other , including diamonds , football , malls , chocolates , Iraqi restaurants , a religious university , and an open-space African safari with lions .
#Text=Small green public gardens are plentiful and all streets are tree-lined .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Ramat Gan was founded in 1921 as a moshav ( a communal farming community ) .
#Text=Over time the population grew as Tel Aviv sprawled , and today the population exceeds 135,000 .
#Text=Northwest Ramat Gan features a cluster of sparkling skyscrapers , which , at night , impresses you with a magnificent Manhattan-style skyline .
#Text=There , you will find the tallest building in Israel ( 75 floors ) , right next to the two skyscrapers comprising of the diamond stock exchange .
#Text=This area , called the Boursa , turns at night into a sleazy collection of brothels and illegal casinos .
#Text=The rest of the city , just like its name , is residential with green gardens here and there .
#Text=Some embassies ( including the EU delegation ) are located here , instead of Tel Aviv .
#Text=A lot of political wheeling and dealing goes on at the Ramat Gan Sheraton City Towers , which is a preferred hang out for Likud Party primaries conferences .
#Text=In the northeast , you will find the first successful shopping mall in Israel ( Kanyon Ayalon ) surrounded by huge outlet stores .
#Text=Next to it are a shooting range ( " mitvach " ) , the biggest soccer stadium in the country , and the Ramat Gan National Park .
#Text=On the southeast side of town is Bar Ilan University , which combines university studies with an orientation towards the religious Jewish community .
#Text=Ramat Gan is also associated with chocolates , as those passing by the " Elite " factory on Jabotinski Road would catch sweet whiffs of chocolate in the blending .
#Text=Last but not least , Ramat Gan is known as Baghdad Town .
#Text=Most Jewish immigrants from Iraq settled here in the 1950s and made Ramat Gan their home .
#Text=As a result , many Iraqi restaurants can be found here .
#Text=By bus
#Text=The easiest way to get to Ramat Gan from Tel Aviv is by bus .
#Text=From the Tel Aviv central bus station : Lines 21 , 31 , 34 , 51 , 52 , 53 , 54 , 60 , 68 , 70 , 82 , 160 , 268 , 524 , 525 , 531
#Text=From the Tel Aviv Central ( Arlozorov ) train station : Lines 42 , 51 , 53 , 55 , 60 , 61 , 65 , 68 , 69 , 70 , 82 , 142 , 160 , 161 , 240 , 268
#Text=From the Jerusalem central bus station : Line 400 goes directly to Ramat Gan .
#Text=However , if you are going to the western parts of Ramat Gan , it is more efficient to take line 480 to the Arlozorov train station , which is just outside Ramat Gan .
#Text=By train
#Text=Trains go from most cities to the , which is walking distance to the Ramat Gan business district ( Boursa ) .
#Text=To get elsewhere in Ramat Gan , take a local bus from the train station .
#Text=Get around
#Text=The city center is small enough to walk around .
#Text=For longer distances , take a bus .
#Text=Ramat Gan is integrated into the greater Tel Aviv bus network , so there are few routes that serve Ramat Gan specifically .
#Text=Line 65 goes almost everywhere in Ramat Gan - the stadium , Bursa , city center , and several neighborhoods , finally ending at the Sheba hospital in the southeast .
#Text=See
#Text=Harry Oppenheimer Diamond Museum , Jabotinsky 1 .
#Text=Ramat Gan is a center of the worldwide diamond polishing industry .
#Text=You can learn about it in this museum .
#Text=Spiral House .
#Text=An architectural landmark by architect Zvi Hecker .
#Text=The top floors have a rounded shape , and are held up by spiraling columns which include the stairs .
#Text=Do
#Text=Ramat Gan Safari , ☏ +972-3-6305305 .

#Text=~09:00-sundown , except Fridays which are 09:00-14:00. The main zoo for the Tel Aviv area , occupying 250 acres and including 1,600 animals of different species : 68 species of mammals , 130 species of fowl , and 25 species of reptiles .
#Text=There is a regular zoo , and also a larger " safari " area where you can drive around in your car with the wildlife just outside .

#Text=₪69 ( ₪62 with discount ) .
#Text=Maccabiah .

#Text=This is the Jewish Olympics , where Jewish communities from all over the world send their athletes to compete and mingle at the Maccabiah village at " Kfar Maccabiah " a full scale sports hotel and compound .
#Text=Avraham Krinitzi National Park , Southern Ramat Gan , Ehad Ha'am st. ( By bus , lines 33 , 57 and 67 ) .
#Text=Also simply known as ' The National Park ' , is the biggest park in Ramat Gan and a favourite place for BBQ'ing .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Su - Th 09:30 - 22:00 , F 09:30 - 15:00 , Sa 19:00-23:00. The first shopping mall in Israel .
#Text=Still contemporary with lots of shops and cafes .
#Text=Bialik Mall , Jabotinsky corner of Bialik 76 ( Go by bus , lines 1 , 51 , 53 , 66 , 67 , 70 , 240 ) , ☏ +972-3-6721796 .
#Text=Bialik St. .
#Text=Bialik street is the main shopping area in Ramat Gan .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Do n't miss the best Iraqi-style Shawarma in Israel at Shemesh on Jabotiski Road .
#Text=There are plenty of fast food joints along Jabotinski .
#Text=On the edge of Ramat Gan ( Next to Bialik Street ) , practically already in Givatayim , there is the most famous Sabich restaurant in the universe , " Oved " .
#Text=Drink
#Text=Clubs and bars are scarce , just catch a taxi to Tel Aviv ( ₪30 ) .
#Text=Sky Bar , 14 Abba Hillel St. .
#Text=Hemingway ( Hemingway pool bar and restaurant , a great place to play some billiard . ) , Jabotinsky rd. 55 , ☏ +972-3-5757212 .
#Text=24 hours .
#Text=₪55 .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Leonardo City Tower , Diamond Exchange District , 14 Zisman Street , Ramat-Gan 52136 , fax : +972-03-7544445 .
#Text=Kfar Maccabiah , 7 Bernstien St , Ramat Gan , ☏ +972-3-6715715 , fax : +972-3-5744678 , ✉ reservation@kfar-maccabiah.co.il .
#Text=Hotel and sports compound .
#Text=Rimonim Optima Ramat Gan , 1 Krinitzi Street , Ramat Gan 52453 , fax : +972-3-7544445 .
#Text=Business lounge with light snacks and Internet corner for free surfing of the web .
